entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a Quidditch player. He is described as performing impressive dives and catching the Snitch.

entities.name: alicia spinnet
entities.description: A Quidditch player who screams when Harry turns sharply on his broomstick.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: The coach of the team, who calls out to Harry and lets the Snitch out.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: A small golden ball that is the goal of Quidditch. It is described as being let out by Wood and caught by Harry.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: A heavy ball used in Quidditch to try and knock players off their broomsticks. Harry races towards the goal posts with it.

relationships.description: Harry catches the Snitch in his hand.
Harry races towards the goal posts with a Bludger.
Harry loops around Katie Bell to catch the Snitch.
